TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted but you kill yourself with it

i wish i had a spaceship

granted, but its reentering and has no heatshield

I wish i had the power to summon food

Granted, but it's only an illusion, so it won't feed you

I wish I was a shuttle test pilot

Granted, but your shuttle is on fire, and it's going to blow up very soon.

I wish I could have a donut right now.

granted, its made of maggots and poop

i wish i had a warp drive engine

Granted, but it warps only tin cans and plastic bottles.

I wish for global peace...

... between spiders. Granted!

I wish Fallout 4 came out tomorrow!

Due to the developers rushing it, FO4 ultimately becomes more infamous and broken than Sonic '06.

I wish plainawesome would change his Steam avatar to the Windows 7 pearl or Windows 8/10.

He changes it to the Windows 7 pearl, and immediately explodes.

I wish i was a wizard.

Granted. Everyone agrees that you can call yourself a wizard and that this does in fact make you a wizard. The ability to do magic (which obviously doesn't come free with the title) has absolutely nothing to do with whether or not you are or are not, in fact, a person of a wizardry nature.

I wish I could write a decent science fiction or fantasy story.

Granted. You write "Twilight".

I wish i didnt procrastinate so much.

Granted, But your new task is to procrastinate.

I wish I was on Kepler-186f

granted, but you re poisoned and theres no food

i wish this thread was closed

granted, you now have a closed string.

wishes for a linux SD card

granted, but theres a big hole on it, and its also on fire

i wish i had a large coke bottle

Granted, you get a large bottle of coke. However, it's powdered and the authorities have your location...

I wish for popcorn

gets popcorn.

it's on fire.

i wish for a better laptop.

Granted. But It overheats and breaks down. Too bad you don't have a warranty ..

I wish for better drawing skills.

You draw so well, you gain a huge fan base. They demand more and more art until you only draw art, and you pass out due to sleep deprivation.

I wish for a roast beef and cheese sandwich, no tomatoes.

Granted, but the fish and cow had tomatoes.

I wish for a corrupted wish.

granted, but instead you get a cake. (a corrupted one)

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹I wish my ksp wasnt broken

KSP dosnt exist anymore.

i wish that every craft i make will come true

Granted. They don't work.

I wish for a shield.

Granted, but it's a paper shield.

I wish that I could use hyperedit in real life.

Granted. You hyperedited yourself into a black hole.

I wish for a paperclip.
